input.name: canonical
input.label: Generate Canonical meta?
input.help-text: Generates the canonical page URL meta data for all content. URL is generated by the code so no additional settings needed.

input.name: siteVerification
input.label: Google Search Console (site verification code)
input.help-text: Do you want to use Google Search Console? Then you need to verify that you own the site. Add verification code in this field to generate the necessary meta field. We will not generate this tag if field is left empty (good if you've already added this field elsewhere).

input.name: blockRobots
input.label: Hide site from search engines?
input.help-text: Caution: Use this to ask search engines to ignore your entire site!

input.name: disableAppConfig
input.label: Don't overwrite values from app.config
input.help-text: It's possible to configure this app for all your site through a file on the server, here you can disable this behavior.

input.name: twitterUsername
input.label: Twitter username (must begin with @)
input.help-text: Using Twitter? Just add your Twitter username here (starting with the @ symbol) to generate Twitter Card metadata on all pages. It uses the same data used in Open Graph metadata, so no further settings needed.

input.name: seoImage
input.label: Content image fallback
input.help-text: If current content image is not found, use this as last resort. Tip: add company logo here!

input.name: seoImageIsPrescaled
input.label: Serve the content fallback image as is. No system scaling.
input.help-text: Image will otherwise be scaled to 1200x630px and set to jpg with quality 85

input.name: frontpageImage
input.label: Frontpage image fallback
input.help-text: Use this for a special image for the frontpage only!

input.name: frontpageImageIsPrescaled
input.label: Serve the frontpage image as is. No system scaling.
input.help-text: Image will otherwise be scaled to 1200x630px and set to jpg with quality 85

input.name: seoTitle
input.label: Title fallback
input.help-text: If current content title is not found this title will be used as a fallback. If not used, the site content's displayName will be used instead.

input.name: seoDescription
input.label: Description fallback
input.help-text: A default fallback description to use if current content does not have one. If not used, the site content's description field will be used instead. However, if that also is empty, we'll skip generating this meta field.

input.name: titleBehaviour
input.label: Append site name to all titles?
input.help-text: This will add the main site's name/title (displayName on site content in Content Studio) at the end of the title on all pages. So it will look something like "Current page - My Site".

input.name: titleSeparator
input.label: Separator ('content - site')
input.help-text: If site title is added to page title, use this to separate them. Default is a dash, " - ", making a page title become "Page title - Site title".

input.name: titleFrontpageBehaviour
input.label: Remove site name on frontpage?
input.help-text: On the frontpage, content title and site title is the same, so title result might look duplicate and odd (like "My Website - My Website", use this setting to remove site name from frontpage title and only use content title.

input.name: pathsImages
input.label: Images (comma-separated)
input.help-text: Any custom fields in your content types that you want to use for generating metadata for images? Add them here, comma separated. It's the json paths we're after here, like "headerImage, someOtherfField" or "someOtherField". It will be prioritized before all other fields. Check Github readme for detailed explanation.

input.name: pathsTitles
input.label: Titles (comma-separated)
input.help-text: Any custom fields in your content types that you want to use for generating metadata for titles? Add them here, comma separated. It's the json paths we're after here, like "headerText, myCoolTitle" or "mySecondaryTitle". It will be prioritized before all other fields. Check Github readme for detailed explanation.

input.name: pathsDescriptions
input.label: Descriptions (comma-separated)
input.help-text: Any custom fields in your content types that you want to use for generating metadata for page description? Add them here, comma separated. It's the json paths we're after here, like "ingress, subTitle" or "subTitle". It will be prioritized before all other fields. Check Github readme for detailed explanation.
